ModMetaData.name: Concrete Patches
ModMetaData.description: Concrete Patches is a modernization of the beloved [RF] Concrete mod. This comprehensive overhaul brings a host of enhancements, including grouped buildings for easier management, tweaked asphalt and concrete floor requirements for realism, sandbags needing sand, and added research prerequisites to align with tribal progression. Customize your gameplay with options like Hardmode and seamlessly integrate with other mods. With refreshed textures and graphics, Concrete Patches offers a refreshed and enriched take on [RF] Concrete.
ModMetaData.author: Muad
